content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Welcome, Max. Thank you for showing interest in the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What price range do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me your price?

I am dependable and responsible, and I want to have a good relationship with my landlord.

Keep in mind that the rental price is negotiable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest, Max. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I am looking for a rental price of €800 per month. However, I am willing to negotiate with you and consider any reasonable offers you may have.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €800 per month.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I will pay rent on time and respect the property.

I understand that the rental price is negotiable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great, Max. I'm glad to hear that you are willing to pay the agreed rental price of €800 per month. As a landlord, I appreciate your willingness to be on good terms with me and respect the property. I look forward to having you as my tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
